title: The KitchenAid® 2-Speed Hand Blender
description: The KitchenAid 2-Speed Hand Blender with DC motor - Powerful blending in the palm of your hand. Blend, puree and crush everything from cold smoothies to hot soup to apple sauce with simple, one touch control. Mix and store homemade sauces or baby food purees in the 3-cup BPA free blending jar and lid. The removable 8-inch stainless steel blending arm blends your favorite ingredients in deeper pots while the splash guard increases airflow and helps prevent splashing. Clean up is quick and easy so you have more time to enjoy your creations. Premium performance, exceptional results & legendary KitchenAid quality.

asset.author: KitchenAidCa

transcripts:
[MUSIC PLAYING] The KitchenAid 2-Speed Hand Blender with DC motor, powerful blending in the palm of your hand. Blend, puree, and crush everything from cold smoothies to hot soup to apple sauce with simple one touch control. Mix and store homemade sauces or baby food purees in the three-cup BPA-free blending jar and lid.

The removable eight-inch stainless steel blending arm blends your favorite ingredients in deeper pots while the splash guard increases airflow and helps prevent splashing. Cleanup is quick and easy so you have more time to enjoy your creations. Premium performance, exceptional results, legendary KitchenAid quality. 

[MUSIC PLAYING]
